tag_list: veodin, keyrocket, keyboard-shortcuts, productivity, excel, word, power-point, outlook, windows-explorer, software
overview: Matthias Mayrock is the co-founder and head developer of KeyRocket. After graduating from computer science at the University of Regensburg in Germany, he worked for several companies, continuously expanding his programming skills. His strengths lie in the fields of cross-platform application programming and planning and realizing large-scale software projects. For several years he was also employed at Ableton AG as Application Development Team Manager. There, he worked as technical and disciplinary team leader being involved in numerous release cycles of the down-market software “Ableton Live”.
